alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hendry, west central Palm Beach and south central Glades Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Montura, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clewiston, Moore Haven, Montura, Lake Harbor, Devils Garden, Harlem and Lake Hicpochee. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Glades; Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County
